meanings.definition: A drink made of flavored ice blended with fruit or soda.
meanings.sent1: I love to sip on slushies during hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The movie theater sells slushies in various flavors.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the slushies disappeared faster than the cake!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like a fizzy slushie.
meanings.sent5: The colorful slushies sparkled under the bright sun.

meanings.definition: A semi-frozen mixture of snow and water.
meanings.sent1: The kids had a blast playing with slushies in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The slushies on the sidewalk were starting to melt.
meanings.sent3: The slushies on the mountain made for slippery slopes.
meanings.sent4: The slushies glistened like diamonds in the winter sun.
meanings.sent5: The slushies crunched under our boots as we walked.
